attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call upon this Government to back the National Federation of Retail Newsagents in their campaign to stop the closing of small shops. We are asking for support on the following issues:

-          The Competition Commission to investigate the duopoly within the newspaper wholesaler market

-          Supporting the planning needs test 

-          Addressing business crime issues through support of organisations such as the National Business Crime Forum 

-          The re-evaluation of business rates and the promotion of a new tier of combined business and domestic rates for shop-owners who live above their shops

-          Minimum alcohol pricing in shops to stop binge drinking 

-          The revisiting of the tobacco display ban regulations that disproportionately impact independent retail micro businesses and are not evidence based 

 

Please sign and show your support for your local retailer.
